mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.chinese_name AS "chineseName", a.strategy_process AS "strategyProcess", a.conclusion AS "conclusion", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO eam_aa_strategy( id, name, chinese_name, strategy_process, conclusion, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{chineseName}, #{strategyProcess}, #{conclusion}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE eam_aa_strategy SET name = #{name}, chinese_name = #{chineseName}, strategy_process = #{strategyProcess}, conclusion = #{conclusion}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
